pages.text: These are very valuable artifacts that rarely fall into the hands of surface inhabitants.$(br2) I have never seen one, but I know they contain great power within. They are described as circular objects made from stone with a shining symbol in the center. $(o)But how do Carvers make them, and why?
$(o)I think I will find all the answers in Carver villages.
$(o)$(br) That's a dead end.$(br2) I cannot find anything else, not even the slightest hint, nothing.$(br2) Looks like I set too great of a goal...
